abstract: Australian researchers find that obese people who lost weight experienced metabolic and hormonal changes even one year later that increased their appetites, causing subjects to gain back their weight; study is published in The New England Journal of Medicine.
snippet: Australian researchers found that obese people who lost weight experienced metabolic and hormonal changes even a year later that increased their appetites.
lead_paragraph: Australian researchers found that obese people who lost weight experienced metabolic and hormonal changes even a year later that increased their appetites.

headline.main: Study Shows Why It’s Hard to Keep Weight Off
headline.print_headline: Study Shows Why It’s Hard To Keep Weight Off
